cshelp.title: Android Emulator view
cshelp.shortdesc: Presents a simulated handset to which you can deploy and test your applications.

cshelp.title: New Android Project wizard
cshelp.shortdesc: Creates a new MOTODEV Studio for Android project.

cshelp.title: New Android Widget Project wizard
cshelp.shortdesc: Creates a new MOTODEV Studio for Android project for an Android widget.

cshelp.title: New Activity wizard
cshelp.shortdesc: Creates a new activity in an existing project.

cshelp.title: New Android Activity Based on Template wizard
cshelp.shortdesc: Creates a new activity, based on a sample activity, in an existing project.

cshelp.title: New Broadcast Receiver wizard
cshelp.shortdesc: Creates a new broadcast receiver in an existing project.

cshelp.title: New Content Provider wizard
cshelp.shortdesc: Creates a new content provider in an existing project.

cshelp.title: New Android Widget Provider wizard
cshelp.shortdesc: Creates a new Android widget provider in an existing project.

cshelp.title: New Service wizard
cshelp.shortdesc: Creates a new Android service in an existing project.

cshelp.title: Preferred AVD Offline dialog
cshelp.shortdesc: Shown when the AVD specified by a run configuration is not running, and a compatible AVD is running. This dialog allows you to specify whether the app should be deployed to the compatible AVD or the specified AVD.

cshelp.title: Collect Log Files dialog
cshelp.shortdesc: Allows you to collect Eclipse and Studio log files and package them into a single ZIP archive.

cshelp.title: Device Management view
cshelp.shortdesc: Displays configuration information for a selected device and can be used to manually start or stop a selected device.

cshelp.title: Create a New Device dialog
cshelp.shortdesc: Creates a new Android Virtual Device (AVD).

cshelp.title: New Android Virtual Device Instance dialog (main information)
cshelp.shortdesc: Supply basic information about the AVD, such as the target operating system and the device skin to use.

cshelp.title: New Android Virtual Device Instance dialog (startup options)
cshelp.shortdesc: Supply options to use when starting the AVD.

cshelp.title: MOTODEV Studio for Android Application - run/debug configuration dialog
cshelp.shortdesc: A run configuration brings together all of the information needed to run a specific executable on a specific device instance, making it simple to repeatedly run that executable on that device instance.

cshelp.title: Instance Selection dialog
cshelp.shortdesc: Select a device instance (either real or emulated).

cshelp.title: Activity Selection dialog
cshelp.shortdesc: Select an activity.

cshelp.title: Project Selection dialog
cshelp.shortdesc: Select a project.

cshelp.title: Package Signing dialog
cshelp.shortdesc: Allows you to sign one or more Android packages with a public/private key pair.

cshelp.title: Package Signature Removal dialog
cshelp.shortdesc: Allows you to remove the signatures applied to one or more packages.

cshelp.title: Application Signing Tool view
cshelp.shortdesc: Automates the digital signing of applications for Android devices.

cshelp.title: Android Emulator preferences
cshelp.shortdesc: Contains preferences that control the operation of the Android Emulator view.

cshelp.title: MOTODEV Studio for Android preferences
cshelp.shortdesc: Contains preferences specific to MOTODEV Studio for Android.

cshelp.title: MOTODEV Login preferences
cshelp.shortdesc: Contains preferences specific to publishing apps to Motorola.

cshelp.title: MOTODEV Database preferences
cshelp.shortdesc: Contains preferences that are used when working with databases within MOTODEV Studio.

cshelp.title: Create Key Pair dialog
cshelp.shortdesc: Create a public/private key pair.

cshelp.title: Import Certificate dialog
cshelp.shortdesc: Import a certificate.

cshelp.title: Import Key dialog
cshelp.shortdesc: Import a key.

cshelp.title: Create Key dialog
cshelp.shortdesc: Create a new self-signing key for use when signing Android packages (APKs).

cshelp.title: Import Keystore dialog
cshelp.shortdesc: Import a keystore created outside of MOTODEV Studio for use within MOTODEV Studio's Signing and Keys view.

cshelp.title: Export Android Package Files dialog
cshelp.shortdesc: Create Android package files for selected projects.

cshelp.title: Install application dialog
cshelp.shortdesc: Specify a package to be installed.

cshelp.title: Uninstall Application dialog
cshelp.shortdesc: Specify one or more packages to be removed from a device.

cshelp.title: MOTODEV Database Explorer
cshelp.shortdesc: View and edit SQLite databases in Android apps.

cshelp.title: SQL Scrapbook
cshelp.shortdesc: Construct and execute SQL statements.

cshelp.title: Database Management Classes
cshelp.shortdesc: Generate classes that allow you to manage and access a database.

cshelp.title: Download Components
cshelp.shortdesc: Downloads and installs new components, such as SDKs, SDK add-ons, language packs, and code samples.

cshelp.title: SDK Download Location
cshelp.shortdesc: Specifies the location to which the Android SDK should be downloaded.

cshelp.title: SDK Not Found
cshelp.shortdesc: Indicates that the chosen SDK could not be downloaded due to a problem with your Internet connection.

cshelp.title: Emulator Language
cshelp.shortdesc: Changes the device's language configuration.

cshelp.title: Analyze Memory Using MAT dialog
cshelp.shortdesc: Select the running application to be analyzed using MAT, the Eclipse memory analyzer.

cshelp.title: Run Configurations (Monkey) dialog
cshelp.shortdesc: The Android UI/Application Exerciser Monkey sends pseudo-random events (within limits you set) to your application. This can prove to be an effective way to exercise little-used paths within your code, thus uncovering bugs you might otherwise not find. Within MOTODEV Studio for Android you create "Test events with Monkey" run configurations that specify the device on which to test, the packages to be exercised, the number of pseudo-random events to send, and other constraints on how the events are generated. These configurations allow you to create repeatable test scenarios for your applications.

cshelp.title: MOTODEV Studio
cshelp.shortdesc: Use this dialog to control whether Java classes should be obfuscated when the parent Android project is built for release.

cshelp.title: Obfuscation
cshelp.shortdesc: Obfuscate the Java classes that make up one or more Android projects.

cshelp.title: Generate Java Code Based on Layout
cshelp.shortdesc: Generates boilerplate code for selected UI elements defined in an activity's or fragment's layout file.

cshelp.title: MOTODEV Video Tutorials view
cshelp.shortdesc: Presents tutorial videos that demonstrate how to use MOTODEV Studio.

cshelp.title: Create New Database
cshelp.shortdesc: Creates a new database, and optionally defines one or more new, empty tables within that database.

cshelp.title: Create New Table
cshelp.shortdesc: Defines a new, empty table within an existing database.

cshelp.title: Generate Options Menu Code Based on XML file
cshelp.shortdesc: Generates options menu code from a selected XML-format menu definition file in your project's res/menu folder.

cshelp.title: Select Database Table dialog
cshelp.shortdesc: Allows you to select the database table to be displayed when creating a new activity based upon the Database List template.

cshelp.title: Select Table Columns dialog
cshelp.shortdesc: Allows you to select the database table's columns to be displayed when creating a new activity based upon the Database List template.

cshelp.title: Keys and Keystores
cshelp.shortdesc: Keys (public/private key pairs) are used to sign Android packages (APKs); APKs cannot be installed unless they are signed. Keys are contained within specially formatted files known as "keystores."

cshelp.title: Import Entries dialog
cshelp.shortdesc: Import into a keystore selected entries (keys) from another keystore.

cshelp.title: Create Keystore dialog
cshelp.shortdesc: Create a new keystore. A keystore contains keys for use when signing Android packages (APKs); each key must reside within a keystore.

cshelp.title: Change Keystore Type dialog
cshelp.shortdesc: Change the file format of a keystore.

cshelp.title: Keystores Backup dialog
cshelp.shortdesc: Back up one or more keystores to a zip archive.

cshelp.title: Restore From Backup dialog
cshelp.shortdesc: Restore one or more keystores that had been backed up to a zip archive.

cshelp.title: Key Properties dialog
cshelp.shortdesc: Examine the various properties of a key.

cshelp.title: Import Keystore (during package export) dialog
cshelp.shortdesc: Select a keystore that isn't known to the Signing and Keys view for use during the package export process.
